com.ephesoft.dcma.batch.encryption.service

Interface EncryptionKeyService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EncryptionServiceImpl

    public interface EncryptionKeyService
    Provides the encryption key to be used at different levels through out the application. Encryption key can be used at Application level, Batch class level, Instance Level, Learning Folder Key, Fuzzy Search Key etc.
    Version:
    1.0
    $LastChangedDate: 2015-04-14 11:40:05 +0530 (Tue, 14 Apr 2015) $
    $LastChangedRevision: 21582 $
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on Apr 10, 2015

    • Method Detail

      • getApplicationKey

        byte[] getApplicationKey()
                         throws KeyNotFoundException
        Gets the application level key. It is configured one per application. This key acts as a signature for the application. This key should uniquely identify an application should be used to generate Instance Key, Lucene Key, Fuzzy key etc.
        Returns:
        byte[] Application level key i.e. signature of the application.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - when the application key is not found.

      • generateApplicationKey

        void generateApplicationKey(byte[] key)
                            throws KeyGenerationException
        Generates the private key for the whole application. This key will be one key per application. This key should be used to generate Instance level, fuzzy level, lucene level key.
        Parameters:
        key - byte[] key to be assigned to the application.
        Throws:
        KeyGenerationException - when the key could not be generated for the application.

      • generateBatchClassKey

        void generateBatchClassKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier,
                         byte[] key)
                           throws KeyGenerationException
        Generates the private key for the batch class. This key will be one key per batch class. This key should be used to generate Instance level, fuzzy level, lucene level key.
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String identity of the batch class.
        key - byte[] key to be assigned to the batch class.
        Throws:
        KeyGenerationException - when the key could not be generated for the batch class.

      • getBatchClassKey

        byte[] getBatchClassKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier)
                        throws KeyNotFoundException
        Gets the Batch Class private Key. This key will be used to generate the batch instance level key , fuzzy key, lucene key. etc.
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        Returns:
        byte[] key of the batch class.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - when the batch class could not be found.

      • generateBatchInstanceKey

        void generateBatchInstanceKey(java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifier,
                            java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier,
                            PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm encryptionAlgorithm)
                              throws KeyGenerationException,
                                     KeyNotFoundException
        Generates the private key for the batch instance. This key will be one key per batch batch Instance. This key might internally use batch class level key, application key etc.
        Parameters:
        batchInstanceIdentifier - String identity of the batch instance.
        batchClassIdentifier - String identity of the batch class.
        encryptionAlgorithm - PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm the encryption algorithm
        Throws:
        KeyGenerationException - when the key could not be generated for the batch instance.
        KeyNotFoundException - the key not found exception

      • getBatchInstanceKey

        byte[] getBatchInstanceKey(java.lang.String batchInstanceKey)
                           throws KeyNotFoundException
        Gets the Batch Instance private Key. This key might use the application level key and the batch class key for generating instance key .
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        Returns:
        byte[] key of the batch instance.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - when the batch class could not be found.

      • generateLuceneIndexKey

        void generateLuceneIndexKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier,
                          PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm encryptionAlgorithm)
                            throws KeyGenerationException,
                                   KeyNotFoundException
        Generates the Lucene Index Key for the batch Class Identifier. This key might use the application level key and the batch class key for generating lucene key .
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        encryptionAlgorithm - PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm
        Throws:
        KeyGenerationException - when the lucene key cannot be generated.
        KeyNotFoundException - the key not found exception

      • getLuceneIndexKey

        byte[] getLuceneIndexKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier)
                         throws KeyNotFoundException
        Gets the Lucene Index Key for the batch Class Identifier.
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        Returns:
        byte[] key used for lucene index files.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - when the lucene key cannot be generated.

      • generateFuzzyIndexKey

        void generateFuzzyIndexKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier,
                         PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm encryptionAlgorithm)
                           throws KeyGenerationException,
                                  KeyNotFoundException
        Generates the Fuzzy Index Key for the batch class. This key might use the application level key and the batch class key for generating fuzzy key .
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class
        encryptionAlgorithm - PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm the encryption algorithm
        Throws:
        KeyGenerationException - when the fuzzy key cannot be generated.
        KeyNotFoundException - the key not found exception

      • getFuzzyIndexKey

        byte[] getFuzzyIndexKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier)
                        throws KeyNotFoundException
        Gets the Fuzzy Index Key for the batch Class Identifier.
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String Identity of the batch class.
        Returns:
        byte[] Key associated with the fuzzy index.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - when the fuzzy index key could not be found.

      • getBatchClassEncryptionAlgorithm

        PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm getBatchClassEncryptionAlgorithm(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier)
        Gets the Batch Class PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm on the basis of batchClassIdentifier. It is the algorithm on the basis of which the batch class learn files instances, fuzzy files needs to be encrypted.
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String identity of the batch class.
        Returns:
        PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm associated with the batch class. If batch class is un-encrypted then it should return null.

      • getBatchInstanceEncryptionAlgorithm

        PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm getBatchInstanceEncryptionAlgorithm(java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifier)
        Gets the Batch Instance PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm on the basis of batchInstanceIdentifier. It is the algorithm on the basis of which batch instance needs to be encrypted.
        Parameters:
        batchInstanceIdentifier - String identity of the batch instance.
        Returns:
        PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm associated with the batch instance.

      • removeBatchClassKey

        boolean removeBatchClassKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier)
        Removes the Batch Class Key for batchClassIdentifier. Returns true if the batch class key is removed, false if cannot be removed. If no key is configured for the batch class, then returns false.
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String batch class identifier of the batch class whose key needs to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if the batch class key was removed else return true.

      • generateTestTableKey

        void generateTestTableKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier,
                        PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm encryptionAlgorithm)
                          throws KeyGenerationException,
                                 KeyNotFoundException
        Generates the Test Table Key for the batch Class Identifier. This key might use the application level key and the batch class key for generating test table key .
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        encryptionAlgorithm - PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm the encryption algorithm
        Throws:
        KeyGenerationException - when the test table key cannot be generated.
        KeyNotFoundException - the key not found exception

      • getTestTableKey

        byte[] getTestTableKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier)
                       throws KeyNotFoundException
        Gets the Test Table Key for the batch Class Identifier.
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        Returns:
        byte[] key used for test table index files.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - when the test table key cannot be generated.

                     PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm encryptionAlgorithm)
                       throws KeyGenerationException,
                              KeyNotFoundException
        Generates the Test KV Key for the batch Class Identifier. This key might use the application level key and the batch class key for generating test KV key .
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        encryptionAlgorithm - PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm the encryption algorithm
        Throws:
        KeyGenerationException - when the Test KV key cannot be generated.
        KeyNotFoundException - the key not found exception

      • generateTestClassificationKey

        void generateTestClassificationKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier,
                                 PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm encryptionAlgorithm)
                                   throws KeyGenerationException,
                                          KeyNotFoundException
        Generates the Test Classification Key for the batch Class Identifier. This key might use the application level key and the batch class key for generating test classification key .
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        encryptionAlgorithm - PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm the encryption algorithm
        Throws:
        KeyGenerationException - when the test classification key cannot be generated.
        KeyNotFoundException - the key not found exception

      • getTestClassificationKey

        byte[] getTestClassificationKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier)
                                throws KeyNotFoundException
        Gets the Test Classification Key for the batch Class Identifier.
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        Returns:
        byte[] key used for test classification index files.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - when the test classification key cannot be generated.

      • isApplicationKeyGenerated

        boolean isApplicationKeyGenerated()
        Returns whether or not the application key is generated or not.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the application key is generated else returns false.

      • getPrivateKeyAlgorithm

        PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm getPrivateKeyAlgorithm(java.lang.String encryptionAlgorithmName)
        Fetches the private key encryption algorithm for the provided encryption algorithm name.
        Parameters:
        encryptionAlgorithmName - String the name of the encryption algorithm.
        Returns:
        PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm the encryption algorithm object for provided algorithm name.

      • generateTestAdvanceKVKey

        void generateTestAdvanceKVKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier,
                            PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm encryptionAlgorithm)
                              throws KeyGenerationException,
                                     KeyNotFoundException
        Generates the Test Advance KV key for the batch Class Identifier. This key might use the application level key and the batch class key for generating advance KV test key .
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        encryptionAlgorithm - PrivateKeyEncryptionAlgorithm
        Throws:
        KeyGenerationException - when the test KV key cannot be generated.
        KeyNotFoundException - the key not found exception

      • getTestAdvanceKVKey

        byte[] getTestAdvanceKVKey(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier)
                           throws KeyNotFoundException
        Gets the Test Advance KV Key for the batch Class Identifier.
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - String unique identity of the batch class.
        Returns:
        byte[] key used for test advance KV HOCR files.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - when the test classification key cannot be generated.
